articles.content: Google has been under fire for its dominance in online search for years, and currently, the tech giant is facing down a case in the EU over its actions. This week, however, the company is leaning on … [+1468 chars]

articles.author: Brianna Provenzano
articles.title: Netflix Has Acquired Its First Video Game Studio - Gizmodo
articles.description: The indie developer Night School Studio is best known for a game “about a group of friends who unwittingly open a ghostly rift,” which sounds vaguely familiar.
articles.content: Forging ahead with its bizarre plans to expand into the video game space, Netflix has reportedly acquired Night School Studio, an indie game developer that will mark the first acquisition of its kind… [+2375 chars]
